Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="TransferType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Method" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="URI" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CostPolicy" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Group" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="TransferType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Method" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="URI" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CostPolicy" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Group" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="TransferType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Result" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItemId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WorkItemId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Request for unconstrained transfers for process %1 completed: %2 [%3]
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerPolicyValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PromptLogicValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Request for unconstrained transfers for process %1 was canceled
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Request for unconstrained transfers for process %1 failed: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CostPolicy" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Priority" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Current network cost: Internet available: %1, Type: %2, Roaming: %3, Over data limit: %4, Data limit [MB]: %5, Used [MB]: %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IsInternetAvailable" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="CostType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IsRoaming" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IsOverDataLimit" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="DataLimitMegabytes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UsedMegabytes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Operation %1: Core transfer: operation is resuming: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IsResume" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="GroupName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="GroupName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Behavior" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotificationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LocationId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NotificationType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NotificationInformationAvailable" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Operation %1: Current response transfer stats: Elapsed Time [sec]: %2, Remaining [bytes]: %3, Transfer Speed [bytes/sec]: %4, ETA [sec]: %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OperationId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ElapsedTimeInSeconds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TotalBytesRemaining" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="TransferSpeedInBytesPerSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="EtaInSeconds" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>
